actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover, under the hospital insurance program established by part A thereof, inpatient hospital services provided outside the United States to individuals insured under such programs.

summary.text: Provides coverage under the Social Security Act program on hospital insurance (title XVIII, Medicare) for inpatient hospital services provided outside the United States to individuals insured under such programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover, under the hospital insurance program established by part A thereof, inpatient hospital services provided outside the United States to individuals insured under such programs.
